individual_metadata.synopsis: Possible dialog during the Lake Encounter (if the player jumps on another raft when another player is in dialog)
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger in Multiplayer or following these repro steps.REPRO STEPS:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -453.75, 27.06, -541.254. Move to the other raft.5. Talk to Duergar Alchemist.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session provided (with an empty name). Since no other sessions are present, no ordered dependencies or mutual exclusiveness constraints can be established.

0.speaker: Alchemist Argram
0.text: You tryin' to tip us over? Stop moving, idiot.
